name: easy-digital-downloads
description: The easiest way to sell digital products with WordPress.
author: Easy Digital Downloads

scripts.build: wp-scripts build --webpack-no-externals && npm run build:blocks && npm run translate && grunt build && npm run translate:lite
scripts.build:blocks: cd includes/blocks && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.lite: grunt lite && npm run translate:lite && grunt compress:lite
scripts.local: grunt build && npm run translate:lite && grunt compress
scripts.translate: grunt clean && wp i18n make-pot . languages/easy-digital-downloads.pot --exclude=node_modules,assets,tests,libraries --ignore-domain
scripts.translate:lite: cd build/easy-digital-downloads && wp i18n make-pot . languages/easy-digital-downloads.pot --exclude=assets,libraries --ignore-domain && cd ../../
scripts.translate:repo: cd build/easy-digital-downloads-public && wp i18n make-pot . languages/easy-digital-downloads.pot --exclude=assets,libraries --ignore-domain && cd ../../
